S.FORM: Letsie III 7 bulad 17 demiad, Letsie III, u misingkiway. 1963 a mihca nalecuhan u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung nu Lesotho ayza sa ci Letsie III, micakat a demiad sa i 1996 a mihca 2 bulad 7 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
